forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow showers likely before 3am, then rain and snow showers likely between 3am and 4am, then rain and snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 36. South southeast wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

Mostly cloudy, with a high near 43. South wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
